How to Use These Examples

These examples are meant to inspire your own projects and show what's possible with ChatAndBuild. Here's how to make the most of them:

1

Explore the Examples

Click on any example to see more details about how it was built, including the initial prompt used, key features, and screenshots of the final product.

2

Use as a Starting Point

When starting a new project in ChatAndBuild, you can reference these examples in your initial prompt. For instance: "I'd like to build something similar to the Recipe Finder example, but focused on cocktail recipes instead."

3

Mix and Match Features

You don't have to copy an example exactly. Feel free to combine features from different examples or add your own unique ideas.

Tip: When describing your project to ChatAndBuild, it's helpful to mention specific features or design elements you like from these examples. This gives the AI a clearer understanding of your vision.

Start with a Template

If you're not sure where to begin, you can ask ChatAndBuild to start with one of these templates. Just mention the example name in your initial prompt:

"I'd like to start with the Personal Portfolio template and customize it for my photography business."

Have an Idea? Build It Now!

Ready to create your own project inspired by these examples? Start a new conversation with ChatAndBuild and bring your idea to life!

Create New Project
